content: t h e m o d e r n s k e i n original design by sharon graff basics hat t h e m o d e r n s k e i n basics hat materials list recommended yarn kelbourne woolens germantown or malabrigo rios any worsted weight yarn about 200 yards needles 16inch us 8 size 8 dpns or needle for magic loop stitch glossary stockinette stitch = knit around in circle k2tog = knit 2 stitches together other materials beginning of round stitch marker bor wool wash for soaking and blocking we recommend eucalan but any no rinse wool wash or other delicate wash usually works t h e m o d e r n s k e i n pattern basics hat using cast on the long tail cast on method cast on 88 stitches place bor marker and join in the round be careful not to twist your stitches round 1 knit 2 purl 2 repeat to end of round repeat round 1 for 2 inches or approximately 12 row round 2 knit all stitches continue in stockinette until the hat measures 8 inches shape crown note change to dpn s when there are few too stitches on needle round 1 decrease round *k6 k2tog repeat from * around round 2 and all following even rounds knit round 3 decrease *k5 k2tog repeat from * around round 5 decrease *k4 k2tog repeat from * around round 7 decrease *k3 k2tog repeat from * around round 9 decrease *k2tog repeat from * around cut tail pull through remaining stitches soak in cool water and wool wash for 30 minutes up to overnight squeeze out excess water and lay flat to dry don t pull or stretch out your hat
